anya-e0605n0:4: Yo lokatthāya buddho dhanasutabhariyāaṅgajīve cajitvā pūretvā āramiyo tidasamanupame bodhipakkhīyadhamme,
anya-e0605n0:5: Patvā bodhiṃ visuddhaṃ sakalaguṇadadaṃ seṭṭhabhūto tiloke,
anya-e0605n0:6: Katvā dukkhassa antaṃ katasubhajanataṃ dukkhato mocayittha.
anya-e0605n0:9: Nāhu yenapi tulyo kusalamahimato uttamo bhūtaloke tassevāyaṃ uvimhaṃ suvipulamamalaṃ bodhisambhārabhūtaṃ,
anya-e0605n0:10: Hetuṃ hetvānurūpaṃ sugatagataphalaṃ bhāsato me suṇātha.
anya-e0605n0:13: Jāto yo navame khaṇe sutadharo sīlena suddhindriyo saṃsāraṃ ayato bhavakkayakaraṃ disvā sivaṃ khemato,
anya-e0605n0:14: Taṃ sampāpakamaggadesakamuniṃ sampūjayanto tato uddhānussatibhāvanādikamato sampādaye taṃ sivaṃ.
anya-e0605n0:17: Buddhoti ko buddhaguṇo ti ko so,
anya-e0605n0:42: Ye tesu devā manujā ca brahmā,
anya-e0605n0:67: Na tena tulyo paramo ca vijjati;
anya-e0605n0:68: Kiṃ taṃ guṇaṃ taṃ sadisena dinnaṃ,
anya-e0605n0:111: Uppannuppannake so jinavaramatule pūjayitvā asesaṃ buddho eso hi oso bhavati niyamato byākato tehi tehi tesaṃ tesaṃ jinānaṃ acanamanupamaṃ pūjayitvā sirena,
anya-e0605n0:112: Taṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ sahitvā sakalaguṇadadaṃ pāramī pūrayittha.
anya-e0605n0:167: Sato ca sampajāno ca mātukucchimhi okkami;
anya-e0605n0:171: Tuṭṭhahaṭṭhā va sā mātā puttaṃ passati kucchiyaṃ.
anya-e0605n0:180: Devā ca nāgā asurā ca yakkhā;
anya-e0605n0:205: Sīhanādaṃ nadī tesaṃ devatānaṃ hi sāvayaṃ.
anya-e0605n0:207: Tato puttaṃ gahetvāna gatā mātā sakaṅgharaṃ,
anya-e0605n0:221: Kālakkamena cando va vaḍḍhanto vaḍḍhite kule,
anya-e0605n0:224: Siddhathako hi siddhattho laddhā deviṃ yasodharaṃ,
anya-e0605n0:232: Namo tassa yato mahimato yassa tamo na
anya-e0605n0:318: Hitvā kathaṃ nu padamuddhari so nirāso.
anya-e0605n0:323: Hitvā kathaṃ nu padamuddhari so nirāso.
anya-e0605n0:328: Hitvā kathaṃ nu padamuddhari so nirāso.
anya-e0605n0:333: Hitvā kathaṃ nu padamuddhari so nirāso.
anya-e0605n0:338: Hitvā kathaṃ nu padamuddhari so nirāso.
anya-e0605n0:353: Naccanti tā surapure vaṇitā va tāva.
anya-e0605n0:373: Hitvā kathaṃ nu padamuddhari so nirāso.
anya-e0605n0:378: Disvādisvā iti ratikaraṃ yāti hāhā kimīhā.
anya-e0605n0:384: Hitvā gato so sugato gato va.
anya-e0605n0:389: Hitvā gato so sugato gato va.
anya-e0605n0:394: Hitvā gato so sugato gato va.
anya-e0605n0:399: Hitvā gato so sugato gato va.
anya-e0605n0:404: Hitvā gata so sugato gato va.
anya-e0605n0:409: Hitvā gato so sugato gato va.
anya-e0605n0:414: Hitvā gato so sugato gato va.
anya-e0605n0:430: Hitvā gato so sugato va nūna.
anya-e0605n0:435: Hitvā gato so sugato va nūna.
anya-e0605n0:445: Hitvā gato so sugato va nūna.
anya-e0605n0:475: Tathā hi māro pi tadāha santiṃ,
anya-e0605n0:491: Lokāyātatayā kālo visesaṃ na na saṃsevi,
anya-e0605n0:492: Visesaṃ na na saṃsevi lokā yātatayā kālo.
anya-e0605n0:499: Kaṅkhāgāhakakaṅkhāgha hā hā kaṅkhā kahaṃ kahaṃ.
anya-e0605n0:512: Nunnānenāni nūna na nānanaṃ nānanena no.
anya-e0605n0:517: Devānaṃ nandano devo devadeva na nandi no,
anya-e0605n0:560: Datvāna maṃsaṃ rajjaṃ pitā suddhodano tadā,
anya-e0605n0:569: Etha gaṇgatha bandhatha chaṭṭetha ceṭakaṃ imaṃ,
anya-e0605n0:575: Cakkāvudhaṃ khipento pi nāsakkhi kiñci kātave,
anya-e0605n0:578: Siddhattha kasmā āsi nu āsane mama santake,
anya-e0605n0:579: Uṭṭhehi āsanā no ce phālemi hadayaṃ tava.
anya-e0605n0:582: Pitā vudikkhi taṃ māraṃ mettāyanto dayaparo.
anya-e0605n0:584: Tadā so asambhivācaṃ sīhanādaṃ nadī muni,
anya-e0605n0:585: Na jānāti sayaṃ mayhaṃ dāsabhāvapiyaṃ khaḷo.
anya-e0605n0:587: Yena kenaci kammena jāto devapure vare,
anya-e0605n0:597: Ko hi nāma kareyyañño anummatto sacetano.
anya-e0605n0:602: Nāhaṃ manussomanusso na brahmā na ca devatā,
anya-e0605n0:606: Buddho bodhitale hutvā tāremi janataṃ bahuṃ.
anya-e0605n0:608: Samantā dhajinaṃ disvā yuddhaṃ māraṃ savāhanaṃ,
anya-e0605n0:609: Yuddhāya paccugacchāmi mā maṃ ṭhānā acāvayi.
anya-e0605n0:611: Yante taṃ nappasahati senaṃ loko sadevako,
anya-e0605n0:612: Tante paññāya gacchāmi āmaṃ pattaṃ va asmanā.
anya-e0605n0:614: Icchanto sāsape gabbhe caṅkamāmi ito cito,
anya-e0605n0:618: Atthi thāmaṃ balaṃ mayhaṃ pāṇaghāto na vaṭṭati.
anya-e0605n0:621: Mayhaṃ hi tena pāpena sallāpo pi na yujjati.
anya-e0605n0:624: Kampitā maddiyā dānā sakkhi hoti ayaṃ mahī.
anya-e0605n0:626: Iti vatvā dakkhiṇaṃ bāhuṃ pathaviyā paṇamayi,
anya-e0605n0:630: Tasmiṃ majjhe gato māro sapariso bhayatajjito.
anya-e0605n0:636: Purato gacchati cando rajatacakkaṃ va ambare,
anya-e0605n0:642: Sakko tasmiṃ khaṇe saṅkhaṃ dhamanto abhidhāvati,
anya-e0605n0:648: Evaṃ dasasahassamhi sakko brahmā ca devatā,
anya-e0605n0:654: Tattha naccanti gāyanti seḷenti vādayanti ca,
anya-e0605n0:681: Tato hi dutiye yāme yathāyammupage sari,
anya-e0605n0:687: Tato so tatiye yāme dvādasaṅge asesato,
anya-e0605n0:697: Paññāya mohaṃ chetvāna micchādiṭṭhi tatheva ca.
anya-e0605n0:705: Evaṃ dānādinā taṃ taṃ kilesaṇgaṃ vinodayaṃ,
anya-e0605n0:706: Suvaḍḍhitā mahāpaññā kathaṃ santiṃ na rūhati.
anya-e0605n0:712: Ekkattha dāni sampattiṃ deti bodhiṃ asaṃsayaṃ.
anya-e0605n0:717: Savāsane kilese so jhāpentonumattaṃ pi ca,
anya-e0605n0:742: Addhā laddhā suladdhaṃ vatamiti satataṃ cintayanto subodhiṃ;
anya-e0605n0:750: Na pūjaye ko hi naro sacetano.
anya-e0605n0:778: Ye pissa te bhagavato ca acintiyādī,
anya-e0605n0:804: Takkabyākaraṇañca dhammavinayaṃ sutvā pi yo paññavā,
anya-e0605n0:806: Hetuñcāpi phalena tena saphalaṃ sampassamāno tato bodhiṃ saddahateva tassa mahatāvāyamato sambhavaṃ.
anya-e0605n0:825: Thalaje jalaje vāpi sugandhe ca agandhake.
anya-e0605n0:840: Vassikā mallikā sālā koviḷārā ca pāṭali.
anya-e0605n0:842: Indīvarā asokā ca kaṇikārā ca makulā,
anya-e0605n0:845: Ete caññe ca rukkhā ca valliyo cāpi pupphitā,
anya-e0605n0:849: Kāḷā setā ca mañjaṭṭha nekavaṇṇā supupphitā.
anya-e0605n0:857: Athetta sakuṇā santi dijā mañjussarā subhā,
anya-e0605n0:864: Tasmiṃ hi kinnarā kiccaṃ padīpena karīyati.
anya-e0605n0:870: Sakuṇānaṃ hi saddena mayūrānaṃ hi kekayā.
anya-e0605n0:875: Pabbatānaṃ hi obhāsā maṇīnaṃ jotiyāpi ca,
anya-e0605n0:877: Evaṃ sabbaṅgasampannaṃ kiṃ siyā nandanaṃ vanaṃ.
anya-e0605n0:884: Nāgaloke manusse ca deve brahme ca yaṃ siyā,
anya-e0605n0:891: Buddho bodhesi sattānaṃ tassa pūjemi taṃ dhanaṃ.
anya-e0605n0:893: Khomaṃ koseyyaṃ kappāsaṃ sāṇaṃ bhaṅgañca kambalaṃ,
anya-e0605n0:894: Dukūlāni ca dibbāni dussāni vividhāni te.
anya-e0605n0:897: Yassa siddhaṃ siyā tassa dussāni pujayāmahaṃ.
anya-e0605n0:950: Svāyaṃ dhammo vinayo ca desito sādhukaṃ mayā,
anya-e0605n0:951: Mamaccayena so satthā dhātu cāpi sarīrajā.
anya-e0605n0:959: Tasmā hi tassa saddhammaṃ uggaṇhitvā yathātathaṃ,
anya-e0605n0:960: Yo deseti sambuddho ti natvāna pūjayāmahaṃ.
anya-e0605n0:971: Yattha katthaci sayito āsinno caṅkamepi vā,
anya-e0605n0:974: Na sañjānanti ye buddhaṃ evarūpo ti ñātve,
anya-e0605n0:975: Kataṃ taṃ paṭimaṃ sabbaṃ natvāna pūjayāmahaṃ.
anya-e0605n0:989: Paññā ca me sijjhatu yāva bodhiṃ.
anya-e0605n0:998: Bhogo ca kāyo ca mamesa laddho,
